channel.description: Week 7 Announcements This Week Fri: Lab 3 Deadline Mon 10/20: Lab 4 Quizzes Tue 10/21: Discuss 3 Fri 10/224: Lab 4 Lab 3 Core Network Services Set IP Addresses Install DNS & DHCP Install SNMP See Hints & Diagrams Ask Questions! Lab 3 Grading Remote (RDP & SSH) Static IP on Ubuntu DNS Server Settings DNS Lookups DHCP Settings SNMP & Wireshark Pics Lab 4 Windows Server VM Active Directory OpenLDAP Configure Clients Configure Interop MAKE SNAPSHOTS Success Read Carefully See Posted Hints Use Resources Ask Questions Don't "Spin Your Wheels" Speakers: Nick Eggleston & Nathan Wells Beocat Sysadmins Tuesday 10/21 2:30 PM Speaker: Kyle Hutson Lambda Labs https://lambdalabs.com/ Formerly KANREN Formerly Beocat Tuesday 10/28 2:30 PM Remote This Week Thur & Fri Email responses slower Email for appt. Will get back to you! Keep in Touch! Ed Discussion Discord & Teams "Tea Time" Office Hours One-on-One Office Hours
